page.title: 16POPULATION OF CONGRESBURY
page.content: The population of Congresbury is approx. 3600,there are roughly 1500 houses within the parish.The parish church is St. Andrews,it was concecrated in 1215. There are several modern housing estates as well as many interesting older houses and buildings.There is a shopping precinct which includes a post office,newsagent and greengrocers.There are other shops and several pubs scattered around the village. There are 2 schools,the Glebe Infants and St.Andrews Junior school.135 children attend the infants and 195 the juniors.75% of the parents of the pupils at St. Andrews school travel to Bristol to work,other parents travel to Weston-S-Mare,Clevedon,Yatton or Avonmouth.Only 4 families from the school live or work on the farms.
